1.title: The Grand Classic
1.plot: This episode dives into the beloved car-collecting organization, the CCCA's annual spring meeting, while also meeting up with famous auto-heads, like Jay Leno and Al Jolson.

2.title: Bugatti
2.plot: Otis Chandler, previously owned the museum, which once housed a collection of vintage automobiles and motorcycles. The now revamped structure is home to a delightful rotating display of classic automobiles from the early 1910's to the mid 1950's.

4.title: Ferrari Mad
4.plot: Take a look at this fast paced episode in England that will certainly thrill sports car enthusiasts as it explores Talacrest, the most exclusive vintage Ferrari dealer on the planet.

7.title: The Lost Packard
7.plot: The Packard concept car was built in 1940 and was far ahead of its time. The story of this car and an interview with one of the last of greatest living car design legends is highlighted within this episode.

imdb.plot outline: This is about the art...not engine size or how fast the car will go. This is a series about the cars, collectors and the stories behind theåse rare and unique automobiles. The show will take you back to a time when automobiles represented more than transportation, part of the lifestyle for the elite, and a time when the designer for these creations were considered to be an artist.
imdb.title: Magnificent Motorcars
plot: This episode dives into the beloved car-collecting organization, the CCCA's annual spring meeting, while also meeting up with famous auto-heads, like Jay Leno and Al Jolson.

This is about the art...not engine size or how fast the car will go. This is a series about the cars, collectors and the stories behind theåse rare and unique automobiles. The show will take you back to a time when automobiles represented more than transportation, part of the lifestyle for the elite, and a time when the designer for these creations were considered to be an artist.
